short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a right-click option to send magnet links to Transmission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives an "Add to Transmission" option in the right-click menu. Clicking it will add the magnet link to your Transmission web client (does nothing on non-magnet links).
